snippet.title: Islets Defense: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
➤ Wishlist Islets Defense on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3235170/Islets_Defense/
Wishlist so you get a reminder when the game comes out!

More links: 
➤ Press Kit: https://impress.games/press-kit/minigoof/islets-defense

Islets Defense is a turn-based tower defense game where you build a small village to earn resources and defend your castle

Build a small village to earn resources and defend your castle! Plan structures and towers, upgrade them, explore the map, modify the terrain, and level up to become stronger for the next wave! Islets Defense stands out among Tower Defense games by offering a fresh take on the genre.

Throughout the game, you’ll always have four different actions to choose from, with a unique mechanic that encourages you to juggle between them, requiring strategic foresight without feeling overwhelming. It also blends elements of resource management and base building, all within a simple, intuitive interface that welcomes both seasoned players and newcomers alike.
